content: simple mosaic beanie freckled girl knits janelle serio _____________________________________________________________________________________ specifications sizes adult xs/s m/l xl finished dimensions finished hat circumference 18 20 22 inches finished hat length from crown to earlobe 8 8 5 9 inches to fit head circumferences 19-20 21-22 23-24 inches to be worn with 1-2 of negative ease gauge 20sts/42rds/4 inches in mosaic chart wet blocked choose highly contrasting 20sts/32rds/4inches in stockinette stitch wet blocked colors to make the mosaic pattern pop and using a 100% estimate yardage wool yarn with a nice spring mc 46g/115yds / 50g/125yds / 55g/138yds will further add to the energy cc 23g/55yds / 24g/60 yds / 25g/63yds in the colorwork while maintaining elasticity for the suggested yarn ribbing over time samples were knit using knitted wit victory dk colorways tree bark and tugboat victory dk has been replaced by knitted wit dk knit picks swish dk in colorways cobblestone and karma heather clark & co studio dk in colorways dark teal and bright peach other ideas include malabrigo rios and knit picks swish worsted we ve tried all three needles us6/4mm 16 inch circulars this pattern is written assuming the knitter is using circular needles and dpns but the magic loop method may be used as well us6/4mm dpns or any combination of needles and yarn that achieve gauge **can opt for a needle size down for the ribbing to create a firmer brim as desired** notions ● 1 special stitch marker to mark the beginning of the round and 8 9 10 stitch markers to delineate colorwork repeats ● darning needle scissors waste yarn _____________________________________________________________________________________ ©2023 freckled girl knits | 2
